ygData.subject: Re: Hello all
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome Kedek! My characther, Hamyrmint, is one of the officers for Mystic Alliance.  He being a Dwarf smith, is happy to see another shaman!  Once we get you
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome Kedek!
My characther, Hamyrmint, is one of the officers for Mystic
Alliance. He being a Dwarf smith, is happy to see another
shaman! Once we get you up in levels, we can put you to work
mixing dyes!! ;) Seriously though, I will be probably on Fwayder
toinight seeing if I can finally make Imbued Dwarven Plate. (why
do people always have to start their charachters on the otherside
of the world from where I am). Maybe if Snapdragon is still on
the Antonican side of the world and comes on tonight we can get
him to Selo's his happy ass out there and invite you in.
Hopefully today's patch won't take longer than 12 hours.

Once again, welcome to our insanity!

Jai Sacks

Hamyrmint Forgewell <Mystic Alliance>
41 Cleric of Kaladim
Rodcet Nife


--- In EQ_rainbow@egroups.com, NVKedek@h... wrote:
> Hi Everyone,
>
> I just found this group and believe me, I've been looking for it
for
> a long time! I had been on every search engine I could think of
and
> nothing was coming up, finally I got to HOTBOT and there it
was
> EQ_Rainbow. As I was clicking the link, I thought for sure it
would
> be dead. But it wasn't (YAY!) and here I am. I always knew there
had
> to be others on EQ, but I was starting to have doubts.
>
> I have been playing on Morrel-Thule for the last 7 months or so,
but
> not reguarly until recently. Anyway, I have decided that since I
> finally found the group, I am going to move over to Rodcet Nife
and
> create a new character (I can't believe I have to be a newbie
AGAIN!)
> At least, no one took my name. :-)
>
> Anyway, I just wanted to say "Hey" to everyone and if you are in
EQ
> on Rodcet Nife give a /tell to Kedek, I am very interested in
joining
> the guild.
>
> Until then,
>
> Kedek Vega
> 2nd season Rodcet Nife
> Barbarian-Shaman
